alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 4:58AM MST until November 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches possible. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
